The Nations in Conflict 

     Four mighty angels hold back the powers of this earth till the servants of God are sealed in their foreheads. The nations of the world are eager for 
                                                                           239
conflict, but they are held in check by the angels. When this restraining power is removed there will come a time of trouble and anguish. Deadly instruments of warfare will be invented. Vessels with their living cargo will be entombed in the great deep. All who have not the spirit of truth will unite under the leadership of satanic agencies, but they are to be kept under control till the time shall come for the great battle of Armageddon.--7BC 967 (1900).
